articles.title: How long until Canada sees a high-speed rail come to life?
articles.description: Last week, Ottawa announced a year for shovels to hit the ground for its long-awaited high-speed rail line connecting Toronto to Quebec City. articles.title: A Filmmaker Made a Sam Altman Deepfake—and Got Unexpectedly Attached
articles.description: The director of Deepfaking Sam Altman created a “Sam Bot” when he couldn’t get an interview with the OpenAI CEO. Watch an exclusive trailer for the documentary, which comes out in January.
